attributes.action: Call for the SQA to change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Scottish Qualifications Authority currently lays Childrens entire futures on an hour of work at the end of the school year, despite how they have progessed over the year.  Appeals are rarely accepted, and no attention is given to any work outside of the exam hall.  I am suggesting that the SQA requests schools give constant progress reports, with examples of work about every pupil sitting an exam, be it Standard Grade or any other, with the final grade being acheived by an actual average of progress, not on their memories.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
